trans-unit.source: Use R in HDInsight to customize clusters | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Use R in HDInsight to customize clusters | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to install R using Script Action, and use R on HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to install R using Script Action, and use R on HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: Install and use R on HDInsight Hadoop clusters
trans-unit.target: Install and use R on HDInsight Hadoop clusters

trans-unit.source: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with R using Script Action, and how to use R on HDInsight clusters.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to customize Windows based HDInsight cluster with R using Script Action, and how to use R on HDInsight clusters.

trans-unit.source: For information on using R with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts-linux.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on using R with a Linux-based cluster, see [Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts-linux.md).

trans-unit.source: You can install R on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.
trans-unit.target: You can install R on any type of cluster (Hadoop, Storm, HBase, Spark) on Azure HDInsight by using *Script Action*.

trans-unit.source: A sample script to install R on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1).
trans-unit.target: A sample script to install R on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only Azure storage blob at [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1).

trans-unit.source: **Related articles**
trans-unit.target: **Related articles**

trans-unit.source: [Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts-linux.md)
trans-unit.target: [Install and use R on HDinsight Hadoop clusters (Linux)](hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts-linux.md)

trans-unit.target: [Create Hadoop clusters in HDInsight](hdinsight-provision-clusters.md): general information on creating HDInsight clusters

trans-unit.source: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action
trans-unit.target: [Customize HDInsight cluster using Script Action][hdinsight-cluster-customize]: general information on customizing HDInsight clusters using Script Action

trans-unit.source: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md)
trans-unit.target: [Develop Script Action scripts for HDInsight](hdinsight-hadoop-script-actions.md)

trans-unit.source: What is R?
trans-unit.target: What is R?

trans-unit.source: The
trans-unit.target: The

trans-unit.source: R Project for Statistical Computing
trans-unit.target: R Project for Statistical Computing

trans-unit.source: is an open source language and environment for statistical computing.
trans-unit.target: is an open source language and environment for statistical computing.

trans-unit.source: R provides hundreds of build-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.
trans-unit.target: R provides hundreds of build-in statistical functions and its own programming language that combines aspects of functional and object-oriented programming.

trans-unit.source: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.
trans-unit.target: It also provides extensive graphical capabilities.

trans-unit.source: R is the preferred programming environment for most professional statisticians and scientists in a wide variety of fields.
trans-unit.target: R is the preferred programming environment for most professional statisticians and scientists in a wide variety of fields.

trans-unit.source: R is compatible with Azure Blob Storage (WASB) so that data that is stored there can be processed using R on HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: R is compatible with Azure Blob Storage (WASB) so that data that is stored there can be processed using R on HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Install R
trans-unit.target: Install R

trans-unit.source: A [sample script](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1) to install R on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only blob in Azure Storage.
trans-unit.target: A [sample script](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1) to install R on an HDInsight cluster is available from a read-only blob in Azure Storage.

trans-unit.source: This section provides instructions about how to use the sample script while creating the cluster using the Azure Portal.
trans-unit.target: This section provides instructions about how to use the sample script while creating the cluster using the Azure Portal.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The sample script was introduced with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The sample script was introduced with HDInsight cluster version 3.1.

trans-unit.source: For more information about HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](../hdinsight-component-versioning/).
trans-unit.target: For more information about HDInsight cluster versions, see [HDInsight cluster versions](../hdinsight-component-versioning/).

trans-unit.source: When you create an HDInsight cluster from the Portal, click **Optional Configuration**, and then click **Script Actions**.
trans-unit.target: When you create an HDInsight cluster from the Portal, click **Optional Configuration**, and then click **Script Actions**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Script Actions** page, enter the following values:
trans-unit.target: On the **Script Actions** page, enter the following values:

trans-unit.source: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts/hdi-r-script-action.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")
trans-unit.target: ![Use Script Action to customize a cluster](./media/hdinsight-hadoop-r-scripts/hdi-r-script-action.png "Use Script Action to customize a cluster")

trans-unit.source:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action, for example, Install R.
Script URI Specify the URI to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster, for example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1
Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.
trans-unit.target:
PropertyValue
Name Specify a name for the script action, for example, Install R.
Script URI Specify the URI to the script that is invoked to customize the cluster, for example, https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1
Node Type Specify the nodes on which the customization script is run.

trans-unit.source: You can choose All Nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.
trans-unit.target: You can choose All Nodes, Head nodes only, or Worker nodes only.

trans-unit.source: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.
trans-unit.target: Parameters Specify the parameters, if required by the script.

trans-unit.source: However, the script to install R does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.
trans-unit.target: However, the script to install R does not require any parameters, so you can leave this blank.

trans-unit.source: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.
trans-unit.target: You can add more than one script action to install multiple components on the cluster.

trans-unit.source: After you have added the scripts, click the check mark to start crating the cluster.
trans-unit.target: After you have added the scripts, click the check mark to start crating the cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can also use the script to install R on HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: You can also use the script to install R on HDInsight by using Azure PowerShell or the HDInsight .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: Instructions for these procedures are provided later in this article.
trans-unit.target: Instructions for these procedures are provided later in this article.

trans-unit.source: Run R scripts
trans-unit.target: Run R scripts

trans-unit.source: This section describes how to run an R script on the Hadoop cluster with HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: This section describes how to run an R script on the Hadoop cluster with HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: **Establish a Remote Desktop connection to the cluster**: From the Portal, enable Remote Desktop for the cluster you created with R installed, and then connect to the cluster.
trans-unit.target: **Establish a Remote Desktop connection to the cluster**: From the Portal, enable Remote Desktop for the cluster you created with R installed, and then connect to the cluster.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [Connect to HDInsight clusters using RDP](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see [Connect to HDInsight clusters using RDP](hdinsight-administer-use-management-portal.md#rdp).

trans-unit.source: **Open the R console**: The R installation puts a link to the R console on the desktop of the head node.
trans-unit.target: **Open the R console**: The R installation puts a link to the R console on the desktop of the head node.

trans-unit.source: Click on it to open the R console.
trans-unit.target: Click on it to open the R console.

trans-unit.source: **Run the R script**: The R script can be run directly from the R console by pasting it, selecting it, and pressing ENTER.
trans-unit.target: **Run the R script**: The R script can be run directly from the R console by pasting it, selecting it, and pressing ENTER.

trans-unit.source: Here is a simple example script that generates the numbers 1 to 100 and then multiplies them by 2.
trans-unit.target: Here is a simple example script that generates the numbers 1 to 100 and then multiplies them by 2.

trans-unit.source: The first two lines call the RHadoop libraries that are installed with R. The final line prints the results to the console.
trans-unit.target: The first two lines call the RHadoop libraries that are installed with R. The final line prints the results to the console.

trans-unit.source: The output should look like this:
trans-unit.target: The output should look like this:

trans-unit.source: Install R using Aure PowerShell
trans-unit.target: Install R using Aure PowerShell

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1).

trans-unit.source: Install R using .NET SDK
trans-unit.target: Install R using .NET SDK

trans-unit.source: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).
trans-unit.target: See [Customize HDInsight clusters using Script Action](hdinsight-hadoop-customize-cluster.md#call_scripts_using_azure_powershell).

trans-unit.source: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.
trans-unit.target: The sample demonstrates how to install Spark using the .NET SDK.

trans-unit.source: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps11).
trans-unit.target: You need to customize the script to use [https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps1](https://hdiconfigactions.blob.core.windows.net/rconfigactionv02/r-installer-v02.ps11).
